function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE

Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low social distancing at home during the pandemic period","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential lack of privacy on balconies due to visibility and distance from neighboring balconies and buildings.","category":"Social and Psychological Effects
